summary.description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | A Latent Unknown Clustering Integrating Multi-Omics Data (LUCID) with Phenotypic Traits | Latent Unknown Clustering with Integrated Data | An implementation for the 'LUCID' method to jointly estimate latent unknown clusters/subgroups with integrated data. An EM algorithm is used to obtain the latent cluster assignment and model parameter estimates. Feature selection is achieved by applying the regularization method
summary.name: LUCIDus
